700162f-a.title: Bronx: 159th Street (East) - Grand Concourse
700162f-a.text:
East 159th Street, north side, between Grand Concourse and Walton Ave., showing the home of the Pastime Athletic Club. The house is no longer in existence and on its site now (1937) stands the Bronx County Court House. The street, at this point has also been obliterated.
May 16, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.

700161f-a.title: Bronx: 159th Street (East) - Grand Concourse
700161f-a.text:
East 159th Street, north side, east from but not including Grand Concourse to Sheridan Ave. The 2 -story frame house is at the N.W.
corner of the latter and bearing No. 853 thereon.
May 16, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
